Here for our community

About us:

We are a charitable organisation that has been formed by the community for the community. We endevour to support and provide guidance for the less fortunate and the unprivilaged in our society. This includes; refugees, asylum seekers and homeless people. As an arab group in Rochdale, we welcome all to our meetings and to get in touch. We are here for our community whenever, however, whatever the circumstances.



Our founders:

Dr Souhad Sharif and Wafa Takheroubt:



What we do:

We are here for our community. A few examples of the enormous things that we have helped to organise with the hiraculous efforts of our volunteers:



  • 1. We have distributed food parcels to th vulnerable people in our community.
  • 2. We have signposted people to the various government and local help that is available in this time of difficulty.
  • 3. We have supported poeple who are facing domestic abuse and signposted them to appropriate organisation.
  • 4.We have also provided cooking classes run by youth for people of all ages so that people can pass the time during lockdown - follow us on our Youtube Channel:
